instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3476: What is 820-3476? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen, backlight ON but no Brain
threads.message:
got this mac that fan spins but does not post. Initially does not back image/backlight. CPU vcore is 1.75V
checked around the board and no signs of liquid damage or corrosions. so started measuring SPI termination resisters and all measured fine.
Cleaned ME for the BIOS and now i get backlight but no image and activity. thinking might be bad bios, so i flash a clean ME BIOS from badcaps coming from piernov and still get the same thing. the backlight thing is throwing me off, backlight comes on means CPU is good?
